welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wishaw, the charming town known for its friendly locals and beautiful scenery. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for low-cost and regional flights at Glasgow International Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edinburgh Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network name and agreeing to the terms and conditions.
